definition: A tool typically made of plastic, metal, or wood, consisting of a row of narrow teeth set closely together, used for untangling or arranging hair. It is commonly found in bathrooms and used during personal grooming routines.

examples.german: Der Kamm liegt auf dem Tisch.
examples.english: The comb is on the table.
She is combing her long hair.

examples.german: Er benutzt den Kamm, um seine Haare zu stylen.
examples.english: He uses the comb to style his hair.
The comb is made of plastic.
